sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An exposition of the doctrine of the Catholic Church in matters of controversie by the Right Reverend James Benigne Bossuet ... ; done into English from the fifth edition in French. Exposition de la doctrine de l'Eglise catholique sur les matières de controverse. English Bossuet, Jacques Bénigne, 1627-1704. Johnston, Joseph, d. 1723.
[2], 22, 48 p.
[s.n.], London : Printed in the year, 1685.
Translation of: Exposition de la doctrine de l'Église catholique sur les matières de controverse. Translated by Henry Joseph Johnston, O.S.B. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.) II, p. 242. Signatures: A-C⁴,²B-G⁴. Page 16 of first numbered sequence misnumbered 19. Reproduction of originals in: Newberry Library and the Huntington Library. Bibliographical references in marginal notes.
=======

[2], 22, 48 p.

Translation of: Exposition de la doctrine de l'Église catholique sur les matières de controverse. Translated by Henry Joseph Johnston, O.S.B. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.) II, p. 242.
